product_name: Hennessy Hammock Hyperlight Asym Zip Hammock
long_description: The Hennessy Hyperlight Asym Zip hammock shelter combines durability and comfort with light weight and packability-- perfect for thru-hikers and those who want to minimize their load.
short_description: The Hennessy Hyperlight Asym Zip hammock shelter combines durability and comfort with light weight and packability-- perfect for thru-hikers and those who want to minimize their load.
